product_name: Icebreaker Oasis Long Underwear Leggings - Men's
long_description: Thanks to the lightweight feel and remarkable warmth of merino wool, the men's Icebreaker Oasis long underwear leggings offer essential comfort during any activity on cool days. Soft and warm against skin, lightweight merino wool naturally resists odor, wicks moisture away and dries fast. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Flatlock seams help eliminate chafing. Machine washable, line dry or dry flat in shade. The men's Icebreaker Oasis long underwear leggings have a slim fit.
short_description: Thanks to the lightweight feel and remarkable warmth of merino wool, the men's Icebreaker Oasis long underwear leggings offer essential comfort during any activity on cool days.
